body: Central Maine's trusted local source for natural and organic foods since 1970.
We are a family run business dedicated to providing the
natural, organic and sustainable foods and goods delivered by a knowledgeable and caring staff.

We offer a full array of natural foods, groceries, organic produce, an extensive line of vitamins and supplements, special diet foods, macrobiotic foods, herbal products, cruelty-free body care products, wine and beer, home brewing supplies, eco-friendly household goods, books, natural pet foods and supplies,
We have moved to a new, larger space at 120 Center Street in Auburn, in the Center Street Plaza.  This move has allowed us to
expand the selection of great products we offer our customers.
Please also come see our new, hand picked wine and beer section, with more than 60 organic wines, and more than 100 wines priced at less than ten dollars.
